WorkItem.ClosedComment: Added a Cleared event that notifies when the graph is cleared.
WorkItem.Description: The OnEdgeRemoved and OnVertexRemoved are not called when the BidirectionalGraph.Clear method is called.  This causes event handlers to not catch the graph when it is cleared, the underlying collections are just cleared.
WorkItem.Summary: OnEdgeRemoved and OnVertexRemoved not called with BiDirectionalGraph.Clear() method
